database_info.description: Individual chord-to-emotion mapping database with consonant/dissonant profiles and 23-emotion system including Transcendence
architecture_notes: This database maps individual chords to emotional weights across different musical contexts
Contexts include modal frameworks (Ionian, Aeolian, Dorian, etc.) and stylistic frameworks (Jazz, Blues)
Each chord includes 13-dimensional emotion weights for the core emotion model including Malice
Supports traditional triads, extended harmony, augmented, diminished, and altered chords
Expanded with malice-specific chord progressions for psychological depth
Designed for single chord selection based on emotional prompts
Updated to 22-emotion system for full compatibility
Added consonant/dissonant profiles for each chord
Supports emotional resonance with consonant/dissonant qualities
Added Transcendence as 23rd emotion for mystical/otherworldly chord mappings

musical_contexts.description: Major scale harmony, bright and resolved
Natural minor scale harmony, melancholic and introspective
Dominant 7th based harmony with blue notes
Minor scale with raised 7th, creating dramatic tension
Minor scale with raised 6th and 7th, smooth and sophisticated
Harmonic minor with raised 4th, creating exotic Romani/Eastern European colors
Unstable mode with diminished tonic, expressing anxiety and collapse
